[00:05.59]I'm not your friend or anything
[00:08.91]D**n you think that you're the man
[00:12.49]I think therefore I am

[00:22.42]I think therefore I am
[00:26.81]Stop what the hell are you talking about
[00:30.41]Get my pretty name out of your mouth
[00:32.79]We are not the same with or without
[00:36.76]Don't talk 'bout me like how you might know how I feel
[00:40.15]Top of the world but your world isn't real
[00:44.02]Your world's an ideal
[00:46.31]So go have fun
[00:48.07]I really couldn't care less
[00:49.47]And you can give 'em my best but just know

[00:58.24]I think therefore I am

[ti:Therefore I Am]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:Therefore I Am]
[by:]
[offset:0]

[00:05.59]我不是你的朋友 跟你非亲非故
[00:08.91]你自以为有资格来对我评头论足
[00:12.49]我的存在由我自己做主
[00:15.43]我不是你的朋友 跟你非亲非故
[00:19.02]你自以为有资格来对我评头论足
[00:22.42]我的存在由我自己做主
[00:26.81]够了 你哔哔赖赖地在说什么
[00:30.41]不要用你的嘴玷污了我这圣洁的姓名
[00:32.79]不管怎样 我们都绝不等同
[00:36.76]别再对我指指点点 好像你能跟我感同身受似的
[00:40.15]世界第一 但你的世界根本就是虚幻
[00:44.02]不过是你的自我理想罢了
[00:46.31]所以一边玩去吧
